desc.en: After the fact, Sensei receives a letter from Ayane. Though the Foreclosure Task Force wasn't able to pay off its debt in full, she thanks [USERNAME] Sensei for preserving the group's usual way of life.
desc.jp: After the fact, Sensei receives a letter from Ayane. Though the Foreclosure Task Force wasn't able to pay off its debt in full, she thanks [USERNAME] Sensei for preserving the group's usual way of life.
desc.zh_cn: 所有事件结束后，老师收到绫音寄来的信。绫音向[USERNAME]老师道谢说，虽然没完全还清债务，但是多亏了老师才守住对策委员会的日常。

desc.en: Thanks to Sensei's help, the Foreclosure Task Force has been officially recognized as a club in the school, and will be taking the role as the Student Council. Yet the President remains undecided.
desc.jp: Thanks to Sensei's help, the Foreclosure Task Force has been officially recognized as a club in the school, and will be taking the role as the Student Council. Yet the President remains undecided.
desc.zh_cn: 由于老师的帮助，对策委员会现在被正式认定为学校的社团，承担阿拜多斯学生会的职务，不过学生会长是谁尚未决定。

desc.en: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.
desc.jp: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，阿拜多斯高中的主题曲。常用于阿拜多斯高中成员出现且情况转好时。一个比较著名的使用例是大家在计划救出星野的时候。

desc.en: Serika resumes her work at ramen store, and the boss seems to be much energetic than ever before.
desc.jp: Serika resumes her work at ramen store, and the boss seems to be much energetic than ever before.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 芹香恢复了在拉面店的工作，老板也似乎比以往充满干劲。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 茜香恢复了在拉面店的工作，老板也似乎比以往充满干劲。

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.en: Kaiser Credit had been under investigation by the General Student Council since then, for conducting illegal financial transactions in the black market. The director had also been listed as the main suspects in the illegal student kidnapping case and is wanted. In order to distance themselves from the incidents, Kaiser Corporation fired the director immediately. Loan-wise, interest rates have finally come down to even lower levels than ever before.
desc.jp: Kaiser Credit had been under investigation by the General Student Council since then, for conducting illegal financial transactions in the black market. The director had also been listed as the main suspects in the illegal student kidnapping case and is wanted. In order to distance themselves from the incidents, Kaiser Corporation fired the director immediately. Loan-wise, interest rates have finally come down to even lower levels than ever before.
desc.zh_cn: 凯撒信贷已因在黑市进行非法金融交易而受到联邦学生会的调查，且凯撒公司董事也被列为学生非法劫持案的主要嫌疑人，并遭到通缉。凯撒公司为撇清关系，立刻解雇了董事。贷款方面，利息最终降到了比原来还低的水平。

desc.en: It doesn't change the fact the most lands in Abydos are still owned by Kaiser Corporation, though.
desc.jp: It doesn't change the fact the most lands in Abydos are still owned by Kaiser Corporation, though.
desc.zh_cn: 不过，阿拜多斯的土地大多仍然属于凯撒公司，这点无法改变。

desc.en: It is said that Problem Solver 68 had opened a new office in the Gehenna District. But the Prefect Team has been already strictly monitoring them.
desc.jp: It is said that Problem Solver 68 had opened a new office in the Gehenna District. But the Prefect Team has been already strictly monitoring them.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 便利屋68又开设了新的事务所，据称在歌赫娜自治区，不过风纪委员会已经正在严格监控他们。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 便利屋68又开设了新的事务所，据称在格黑娜自治区，不过风纪委员会已经正在严格监控他们。

desc.en: Ayane can't get any information or figure out what identity is the Black Suit. She mentions that all charges were placed on that Kaiser director.
desc.jp: Ayane can't get any information or figure out what identity is the Black Suit. She mentions that all charges were placed on that Kaiser director.
desc.zh_cn: 绫音无法调查到黑色西服人的身份，并提到所有的罪名都被归到了凯撒董事的头上，至于西服人身份无从得知。

desc.en: The regular meeting of Foreclosure Task Force continues. At the meeting, Serika again proposes a good way to make money: by mining cryptocurrency with GPU. Shiroko suggests that maybe infiltrating a certain building would be better. - though, at the end, both are denied.
desc.jp: The regular meeting of Foreclosure Task Force continues. At the meeting, Serika again proposes a good way to make money: by mining cryptocurrency with GPU. Shiroko suggests that maybe infiltrating a certain building would be better. - though, at the end, both are denied.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿拜多斯对策委员会的定期会议继续召开。会议上，芹香再次提出了赚钱的好方法：通过电脑显卡挖矿赚钱。白子则表示入侵某个建筑物会更好一点。——不过二者均被驳回。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阿拜多斯对策委员会的定期会议继续召开。会议上，茜香再次提出了赚钱的好方法：通过电脑显卡挖矿赚钱。白子则表示入侵某个建筑物会更好一点。——不过二者均被驳回。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阿拜多斯对策委员会的定期会议继续召开。会议上，芹香再次提出了赚钱的好方法：通过电脑显卡挖矿赚钱。白子则表示入侵某个建筑物会更好一点。——不过二者均被驳回。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.jp: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十二首曲子，尤其用于“故事”页及其下属页面中，以及每个故事的结尾（即“To Be Continued”未完待续界面）。
